name: The (Not So) All-Powerful Wizard
description:
A game submitted for the GameDev Underground's "GDU Jam 5 - #FINISHIT!"

The theme was "Use enemies as weapons!" 

As a wizard, well trained in the arts of wind and ice magic, you'll find yourself at a disadvantage in this old castle. The enemies here all wield a spear and shield which are very dangerous for you. But also to each other. As your abilities are limited to freezing and pushing enemies away, it is very unlikely that you could do any damage. If only there was a way to turn these enemies on each other!

This game is made by a team of 3.  It was a lot of fun to make, and a great experience for learning to make a game.  This game turned out to be a bit outscoped, but hope to get the chance to fix a lot of our work later on. A lot of free assets are used, which will be credited in a spreadsheet coupled with the game files.

Post-jam-edit:

The background music we were planning to add, and had ready a few hours before the deadline, but forgot to spend 5 minutes adding it before submitting the project o.O
